EmailTemplate.subject: Make Your Cockpit "Cool" Again With Primus Elite!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[www.midcanadamod.com/]]>
Your Primus 1000 / 2000 cockpit was the greatest back in the day, but now those days are past. Are you done with those tired, old CRT displays – with their poor color, weak contrast, annoying flicker -- and the way they overheat your cockpit? Those screens are obsolete and no longer serviceable. Now there’s a way to make your cockpit “cool” again! The Primus Elite DU-875 liquid crystal display upgrade delivers brighter, clearer, higher resolution images, and 2X the reliability of your old, obsolete DU-870 CRTs. The upgrade is an easy “plug and play” replacement that can be done in less than a day.Upgrade before 6/30/2019 and save up to $175,000* thanks to a $35,000 trade in credit for each DU 870 unit you replace. Contact Mid Canada Mod Center to learn more or request a quote.
UPGRADE MY TECHNOLOGY NOW! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Mid_Canada_Mod_Center_Primus_Elite.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_mcmc_pe&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=primus+elite]]>
*Savings of up to $175,000 is based on upgrading all five displays on a Falcon 900EX. Please contact Mid Canada Mod Center to ask about savings for your aircraft model.
